rh:help.rh:title: Set one or more global properties of an Office Open document

rh:description.para: These functions allow us to modify and update the properties of a document to set things like the author/creator, date modified, etc. setProperty allows us to set general properties by name. creator<- and setUpdated are convenience functions which set specific properties.
These functions update the external archive if doc is descends from OOXMLArchive.

rh:help.rh:arguments:
the object identifying the document of interest. This can be an OOXMLArchive or derived object or a parsed XML document.
xpath expression to identify the property of interest
the new value for the property.
a logical value indicating whether to update the archive or just the XML content of the document in memory
>
a date as a string or POSIXt value

rh:value.para: These are used for their side effect. They generally return the new value.
